verses.verse: וַיָּבִ֙יאוּ֙ <WH935> So they brought אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַיַּצִּ֣יגוּ <WH3322> and set אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> it in the midst הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> of the tent אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָֽטָה־ <WH5186> had pitched ל֖וֹ דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> that David וַיַּקְרִ֛יבוּ <WH7126> for it and they offered עֹל֥וֹת <WH5930> burnt sacrifices וּשְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> and peace offerings לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

וַיְכַ֣ל <WH3615> had made an end דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> And when David מֵהַעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> of offering הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> the burnt offerings וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> and the peace offerings וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <WH1288> he blessed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיְחַלֵּק֙ <WH2505> And he dealt לְכָל־ <WH3605> to everyone אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to every one יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> both man וְעַד־ <WH5704> against אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> and woman לְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> to every one כִּכַּר־ <WH3603> a loaf לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> of bread וְאֶשְׁפָּ֖ר <WH829> and a good piece of flesh וַאֲשִׁישָֽׁה׃ <WH809> and a flagon

וַיִּתֵּ֞ן <WH5414> And he appointed לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> some הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> [certain] of the Levites מְשָׁרְתִ֑ים <WH8334> to minister וּלְהַזְכִּיר֙ <WH2142> and to record וּלְהוֹד֣וֹת <WH3034> and to thank וּלְהַלֵּ֔ל <WH1984> and praise לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

אָסָ֥ף <WH623> Asaph הָרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the chief וּמִשְׁנֵ֣הוּ <WH4932> and next זְכַרְיָ֑ה <WH2148> to him Zechariah יְעִיאֵ֡ל <WH3273> Jeiel וּשְׁמִֽירָמ֡וֹת <WH8070> and Shemiramoth וִֽיחִיאֵ֡ל <WH3171> and Jehiel וּמַתִּתְיָ֡ה <WH4993> and Mattithiah וֶאֱלִיאָ֡ב <WH446> and Eliab וּבְנָיָהוּ֩ <WH1141> and Benaiah וְעֹבֵ֨ד אֱדֹ֜ם <WH5654> and Obededom וִֽיעִיאֵ֗ל <WH3273> and Jeiel בִּכְלֵ֤י <WH3627> instruments נְבָלִים֙ <WH5035> harps וּבְכִנֹּר֔וֹת <WH3658> and with harps וְאָסָ֖ף <WH623> but Asaph בַּֽמְצִלְתַּ֥יִם <WH4700> with cymbals מַשְׁמִֽיעַ׃ <WH8085> made a sound

וּבְנָיָ֥הוּ <WH1141> Benaiah וְיַחֲזִיאֵ֖ל <WH3166> also and Jahaziel הַכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> the priests בַּחֲצֹצְר֣וֹת <WH2689> with trumpets תָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> continually לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> Then on that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he אָ֣ז <WH227> Then נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> delivered דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> David בָּרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> first לְהֹד֖וֹת <WH3034> [this psalm] to thank לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand אָסָ֖ף <WH623> of Asaph וְאֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> and his brethren פ

הוֹד֤וּ <WH3034> Give thanks לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD קִרְא֣וּ <WH7121> call בִשְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <WH3045> make known בָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> among the people עֲלִילֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5949> his deeds
שִׁ֤ירוּ <WH7891> Sing לוֹ֙ זַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> unto him sing psalms ל֔וֹ שִׂ֖יחוּ <WH7878> unto him talk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> of all נִפְלְאֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6381> ye of all his wondrous

הִֽתְהַֽלְלוּ֙ <WH1984> Glory בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6944> ye in his holy יִשְׂמַ֕ח <WH8055> of them rejoice לֵ֖ב <WH3820> let the heart מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <WH1245> that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
דִּרְשׁ֤וּ <WH1875> Seek יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD וְעֻזּ֔וֹ <WH5797> and his strength בַּקְּשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> seek פָנָ֖יו <WH6440> his face תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> continually

זִכְר֗וּ <WH2142> Remember נִפְלְאֹתָיו֙ <WH6381> his marvellous אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> works that he hath done מֹפְתָ֖יו <WH4159> his wonders וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <WH4941> and the judgments פִֽיהוּ׃ <WH6310> of his mouth
זֶ֚רַע <WH2233> O ye seed יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel עַבְדּ֔וֹ <WH5650> his servant בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> ye children יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <WH972> his chosen ones
ה֚וּא <WH1931> He יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> He [is] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> [are] in all the earth מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃ <WH4941> his judgments

זִכְר֤וּ <WH2142> Be ye mindful לְעוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> always בְּרִית֔וֹ <WH1285> of his covenant דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> the word צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> [which] he commanded לְאֶ֥לֶף <WH505> to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> generations
אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which כָּרַת֙ <WH3772> [Even of the covenant] which he made אֶת־ <WH854> with אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> with Abraham וּשְׁבוּעָת֖וֹ <WH7621> and of his oath לְיִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> unto Isaac

וַיַּעֲמִידֶ֤הָ <WH5975> And hath confirmed לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> the same to Jacob לְחֹ֔ק <WH2706> for a law לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> [and] to Israel בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [for] an everlasting
לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> Saying לְךָ֙ אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Unto thee will I give אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> the land כְּנָ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan חֶ֖בֶל <WH2256> the lot נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃ <WH5159> of your inheritance
בִּֽהְיֽוֹתְכֶם֙ <WH1961> were only מְתֵ֣י <WH4962> A few מִסְפָּ֔ר <WH4557> number כִּמְעַ֖ט <WH4592> even a few וְגָרִ֥ים <WH1481> and strangers בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּֽתְהַלְּכוּ֙ <WH1980> And [when] they went מִגּ֣וֹי <WH1471> from nation אֶל־ <WH413> to גּ֔וֹי <WH1471> to nation וּמִמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> and from [one] kingdom אֶל־ <WH413> about עַ֥ם <WH5971> people אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> to another

לֹא־ <WH3808> no הִנִּ֤יחַ <WH3240> He suffered לְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> no man לְעָשְׁקָ֔ם <WH6231> to do them wrong וַיּ֥וֹכַח <WH3198> yea he reproved עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> their sakes מְלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> kings
אַֽל־ <WH408> no תִּגְּעוּ֙ <WH5060> [Saying] Touch בִּמְשִׁיחָ֔י <WH4899> not mine anointed וּבִנְבִיאַ֖י <WH5030> and do my prophets אַל־ <WH408> no תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <WH7489> no harm פ

שִׁ֤ירוּ <WH7891> Sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> all the earth בַּשְּׂר֥וּ <WH1319> shew forth מִיּֽוֹם־ <WH3117> from day אֶל־ <WH413> to י֖וֹם <WH3117> to day יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> his salvation

סַפְּר֤וּ <WH5608> Declare בַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> among the heathen אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבוֹד֔וֹ <WH3519> his glory בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> among all nations נִפְלְאֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6381> his marvellous works

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For גָד֨וֹל <WH1419> For great יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD וּמְהֻלָּל֙ <WH1984> to be praised מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> and greatly וְנוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> he also [is] to be feared ה֖וּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> above all gods

כִּ֠י <WH3588> for כָּל־ <WH3605> for all אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> For all the gods הָעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> of the people אֱלִילִ֔ים <WH457> [are] idols וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> but the LORD שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> the heavens עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> made
ה֤וֹד <WH1935> Glory וְהָדָר֙ <WH1926> and honour לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> [are] in his presence עֹ֥ז <WH5797> strength וְחֶדְוָ֖ה <WH2304> and gladness בִּמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> [are] in his place

הָב֤וּ <WH3051> Give לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <WH4940> ye kindreds עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> of the people הָב֥וּ <WH3051> give לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> glory וָעֹֽז׃ <WH5797> and strength

הָב֥וּ <WH3051> Give לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> the glory שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> [due] unto his name שְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> bring מִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> an offering וּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and come לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <WH7812> him worship לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּהַדְרַת־ <WH1927> in the beauty קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of holiness

חִ֤ילוּ <WH2342> Fear מִלְּפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> him all the earth אַף־ <WH637> Indeed תִּכּ֥וֹן <WH3559> also shall be stable תֵּבֵ֖ל <WH8398> the world בַּל־ <WH1077> lest תִּמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> that it be not moved

יִשְׂמְח֤וּ <WH8056> glad הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> Let the heavens וְתָגֵ֣ל <WH1523> rejoice הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and let the earth וְיֹאמְר֥וּ <WH559> and let [men] say בַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among the nations יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD מָלָֽךְ׃ <WH4427> reigneth

יִרְעַ֤ם <WH7481> roar הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> Let the sea וּמְלוֹא֔וֹ <WH4393> and the fulness יַעֲלֹ֥ץ <WH5970> rejoice הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> thereof let the fields וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּֽוֹ׃

אָ֥ז <WH227> Then יְרַנְּנ֖וּ <WH7442> sing out עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> Then shall the trees הַיָּ֑עַר <WH3293> of the wood מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> at the presence יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֖א <WH935> because he cometh לִשְׁפּ֥וֹט <WH8199> to judge אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

הוֹד֤וּ <WH3034> O give thanks לַיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ט֔וֹב <WH2896> for [he is] good כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

וְאִמְר֕וּ <WH559> And say הוֹשִׁיעֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH3467> ye Save אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> us O God יִשְׁעֵ֔נוּ <WH3468> of our salvation וְקַבְּצֵ֥נוּ <WH6908> and gather us together וְהַצִּילֵ֖נוּ <WH5337> and deliver מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> us from the heathen לְהֹדוֹת֙ <WH3034> that we may give thanks לְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name קָדְשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH6944> to thy holy לְהִשְׁתַּבֵּ֖חַ <WH7623> [and] glory בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8416> in thy praise

בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִן־ <WH4480> From הָעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever וְעַ֣ד <WH5704> even הָעֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> and ever וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> said כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And all the people אָמֵ֔ן <WH543> Amen וְהַלֵּ֖ל <WH1984> and praised לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ

וַיַּֽעֲזָב־ <WH5800> So he left שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> there לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> there before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְאָסָ֖ף <WH623> Asaph וּלְאֶחָ֑יו <WH251> and his brethren לְשָׁרֵ֞ת <WH8334> to minister לִפְנֵ֧י <WH6440> before הָאָר֛וֹן <WH727> the ark תָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> continually לִדְבַר־ <WH1697> work י֥וֹם <WH3117> as every day's בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH3117> required

וְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <WH5654> And Obededom וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> with their brethren שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <WH8346> threescore וּשְׁמוֹנָ֑ה <WH8083> and eight וְעֹבֵ֨ד אֱדֹ֧ם <WH5654> Obededom בֶּן־ <WH1121> also the son יְדִית֛וּן <WH3038> of Jeduthun וְחֹסָ֖ה <WH2621> and Hosah לְשֹׁעֲרִֽים׃ <WH7778> [to be] porters

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> צָד֣וֹק <WH6659> And Zadok הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֶחָיו֙ <WH251> and his brethren הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> the tabernacle יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּבָּמָ֖ה <WH1116> in the high place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> that [was] at Gibeon

לְֽהַעֲלוֹת֩ <WH5927> To offer עֹל֨וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֜ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבַּ֧ח <WH4196> upon the altar הָעֹלָ֛ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering תָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> continually לַבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> morning וְלָעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> and evening וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַכָּתוּב֙ <WH3789> and [to do] according to all that is written בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> in the law יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> which he commanded עַל־ <WH5921> and יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וְעִמָּהֶם֙ <WH5973> With הֵימָ֣ן <WH1968> And with them Heman וִֽידוּת֔וּן <WH3038> and Jeduthun וּשְׁאָר֙ <WH7605> and the rest הַבְּרוּרִ֔ים <WH1305> that were chosen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who נִקְּב֖וּ <WH5344> who were expressed בְּשֵׁמ֑וֹת <WH8034> by name לְהֹדוֹת֙ <WH3034> to give thanks לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> to the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> because לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> because his mercy

וְעִמָּהֶם֩ <WH5973> and with הֵימָ֨ן <WH1968> And with them Heman וִֽידוּת֜וּן <WH3038> and Jeduthun חֲצֹצְר֤וֹת <WH2689> with trumpets וּמְצִלְתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4700> and cymbals לְמַשְׁמִיעִ֔ים <WH8085> for those that should make a sound וּכְלֵ֖י <WH3627> instruments שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> and with musical הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons יְדוּת֖וּן <WH3038> of Jeduthun לַשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> [were] porters

וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> departed כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And all the people אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> to his house וַיִּסֹּ֥ב <WH5437> returned דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> and David לְבָרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> to bless אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> his house פ
